data/tweet-economist/2021/2/136500296555: A year ago I met a Beninese MP in Cotonou. He looked stressed. Why? I asked. He scrolled through his WhatsApp messages, reading from dozens of requests for money from constituents. "Being an MP is like being a bank," he said, adding: "This is where the corruption starts."
